title: Game is Final
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has hide scores enabled in app settings
custom_steps: WHEN a game is final
custom_expected:
THEN the score for the game is not displayed on the schedule page
AND the game status of FINAL is displayed

title: Game in Progress/Final - Win/Loss Records
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has hide scores enabled in app settings
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in progress, or final
custom_expected: THEN the win/loss records will not be displayed

title: Games are Final - Stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Hide Scores is enabled in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a FINAL state
custom_expected: THEN the winning, losing, and save stats are hidden for every completed game.

title: Game is Final - Linescore
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enables Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing a game that is complete
and expands the game cell on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the line score is empty

title: Game in Preview
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enables Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a game that is in preview state
custom_expected: THEN the win/loss/era stats is displayed for all scheduled game's probable pitchers

title: 5 Game Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Team Page scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN the 5 game scoreboard will not display scores 
AND Game Boxscore will not appear underneath the scoreboard

title: Game Score
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Game Score section
custom_expected: THEN the Game Score will be not be displayed

title: Gameday
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Game Score in Game Day
custom_expected: THEN the Game Score will always be displayed regardless of game state

title: Games are Final - Stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Hide Scores is enabled in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEEN a game is in a FINAL state
custom_expected: THEN the winning, losing, and save stats are hidden for every completed game.

title: Game in Preview
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enables Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a game that is in preview state
custom_expected: THEN the win/loss/era stats is displayed for all scheduled game's probable pitchers

title: Game is Final - Linescore
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enables Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a game that is complete
custom_expected: THEN the line score is hidden and replaced with "Final"

title: Audio Controller
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the audio controller with games in progress listed
custom_expected: THEN the innings will be displayed as normal

title: Grey Banner - Top of Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
AND the user has shake to toggle enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user shakes to toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a grey banner display at top of screen 
AND user can dismiss by tapping anywhere 
AND if the user does not dismiss, it will on it's own

title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
AND Shake to Toggle is enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the small banner at the top of the scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the "Hide Scores On" message is displayed

title: MLB.tv Live or Archive Feed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the MLB.tv EPG
custom_expected: THEN the scores will not be displayed on the scoreboard

title: Backing out of MLB.tv
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has enabled Hide Scores in the app settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user backs out of an MLB.tv stream and returns to a tv feed
custom_expected: THEN the box score overlay will be dismissed
